text: Prem Ki Bujhini () is a 2016 romantic drama film directed by Sudipto Sarkar and starring Om and Subhashree Ganguly. An Indo-Bangladesh co-production, it is a remake of the 2011 Telugu-language film 100% Love. Om and Subhasree act together for the first time. ==Cast== * Om as Prithbiraj / Raj * Subhashree Ganguly as Paro * Jannatul Ferdoush Peya as cameo ==Soundtrack== ==Remakes== {| class="wikitable" style="width:50%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" | 100% Love (Telugu) (2011) || Prem Ki Bujhini (Bengali) (2016) || 100% Kadhal (Tamil) (2019) |- | Naga Chaitanya || Om || G. V. title: Prem Ki Bujhini
